Application.Name: Java JRE
Application.Description: Contains both 32bit and 64bit installers. Java Platform, Standard Edition (Java SE) lets you develop and deploy Java applications on desktops and servers, as well as in today's demanding embedded environments. Java offers the rich user interface, performance, versatility, portability, and security that today's applications require. Free Software.

Download.DownloadVersionCheck: Remove-Item "$env:USERPROFILE\AppData\LocalLow\Oracle\Java\" -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue Remove-Item "$TempDir\JavaJREx64\" -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue $FullVersion = (Get-Item $TempDir\$DownloadFileName).VersionInfo.FileVersion $Version = "$($FullVersion[0])u$($FullVersion.Split(".")[2].substring(0,3))" $JavaFileName = "jre1.$($Fullversion.Substring(0,3))_$($FullVersion.Split(".")[2].substring(0,3))64.msi" $JavaProc = Start-Process $TempDir\$DownloadFileName -PassThru Sleep 15 Get-Process -name "Java*JRE*" | Stop-Process New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path "$TempDir\JavaJREx64" -Force Copy-Item "$env:USERPROFILE\AppData\LocalLow\Oracle\Java\jre1*\*" -Destination $TempDir\JavaJREx64\ -Force Rename-Item "$TempDir\JavaJREx64\$JavaFileName" -NewName JavaJREx64.msi -Force
